title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 97 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 97 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.
lineList.cn: 耶和华作王。愿地快乐，愿众海岛欢喜。

lineList.en: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.
lineList.cn: 密云和幽暗，在他的四围。公义和公平，是他宝座的根基。

lineList.en: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.
lineList.cn: 有烈火在他前头行，烧灭他四围的敌人。

lineList.en: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.
lineList.cn: 他的闪电光照世界。大地看见便震动。

lineList.en: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
lineList.cn: 诸山见耶和华的面，就是全地之主的面，便消化如腊。

lineList.en: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
lineList.cn: 诸天表明他的公义，万民看见他的荣耀。

lineList.en: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
lineList.cn: 愿一切事奉雕刻的偶像，靠虚无之神自夸的，都蒙羞愧。万神哪，你们都当拜他。

lineList.en: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，锡安听见你的判断，就欢喜，犹大的城邑原文作女子，也都快乐。

lineList.en: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
lineList.cn: 因为你耶和华至高超乎全地。你被尊崇，远超万神之上。

lineList.en: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 你们爱耶和华的，都当恨恶罪恶。他保护圣民的性命，搭救他们脱离恶人的手。

lineList.en: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
lineList.cn: 散布亮光，是为义人。预备喜乐，是为正直人。

lineList.en: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
lineList.cn: 你们义人当靠耶和华欢喜，称谢他可记念的圣名。
